item.title: 2017Nov14 Reminder to Myself
item.description: A memo to myself First everyday see yourself that you are not getting yourself back into the old habit patterns of the mind and make sure you are quietly working well to get something out as well. Talk about the three month plan. Plan for the three month work in a clear way and find as mininmum distractions as possible. Try to find yourself more comfortable in sharing rather than contemplating inside ownself.
